","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:2754"},{"text":"

ಗುನ್ನಾರ್ ಮಿರ್ಡಾಲ್
